p: Analyses of the compounds present in A. abrotanum have focused primarily on the essential oil present in the herb of the species [ 9, 11, 40]. The composition and concentration of A. abrotanum essential oil are variable and dependent on the cultivation site, among other things [ 9]. The dominant fraction of the oil are compounds with a monoterpenoid structure. The remaining fractions are compounds of sesquiterpenoid, diterpenoid, triterpenoid, or spiroterpenoid structures, and phenylpropanoid derivatives ( Table 1).
